name: (DE)BUGGER
description:
Why is there no web build? It didn't want to work :(

You are a debugger going through someone's code and touching all the unstable code to report it. Once they're reported they get mad and start to shoot at you. Once all are reported get out of there!

Made with 1 day's worth of GameMaker Studio 2 knowledge.

arrow keys and shift to move.
